conversations.content: What types of vehicles are parked next to each other in the image?
In the image, there is a motor scooter, also known as a moped, parked next to a bicycle.
How many bicycles are present in the image?
There is only one bicycle present in the image, parked next to the motor scooter.
Is there any advertisement on the motor scooter?
Yes, the motor scooter has an advertisement on the back.
What color is the motor scooter?
The motor scooter is grey in color.
Where are the motor scooter and bicycle parked?
The motor scooter and bicycle are parked next to a building.
